_comment: Basic action update rules for common GitHub Actions
_description: This file contains rules for updating popular GitHub Actions to their latest versions with high-impact security and performance improvements.

version_rules._comment: Update actions/checkout from any older version to v4
version_rules.recommendation: actions/checkout v4 includes improved security defaults, better performance, and enhanced Git LFS support. Critical security update for v1 and v2 users.

version_rules._comment: Update actions/setup-node to v4 - critical security improvement
version_rules.recommendation: actions/setup-node v4 includes Node.js version validation, improved caching, and security fixes. v2 has known vulnerabilities.

version_rules._comment: Update actions/setup-python to v5 for better performance
version_rules.recommendation: actions/setup-python v5 includes faster Python installation, better caching, and improved Windows support.

version_rules._comment: Update actions/upload-artifact to v4 - breaking changes in API
version_rules.recommendation: actions/upload-artifact v4 uses a new artifacts backend with improved reliability and performance. Note: v4 has breaking changes from v3.

version_rules._comment: Update actions/download-artifact to v4 for consistency
version_rules.recommendation: actions/download-artifact v4 matches the new artifacts backend from upload-artifact v4. Must be used together.

version_rules._comment: Update actions/cache to v4 for better performance
version_rules.recommendation: actions/cache v4 includes performance improvements, better error handling, and cross-runner cache sharing.

version_rules._comment: Update actions/setup-go to v5 for Go toolchain improvements
version_rules.recommendation: actions/setup-go v5 includes Go toolchain improvements, better caching, and enhanced module proxy support.

version_rules._comment: Update actions/setup-java to v4 for JDK improvements
version_rules.recommendation: actions/setup-java v4 includes JDK installation improvements, better version resolution, and enhanced Maven/Gradle caching.

version_rules._comment: Update github/codeql-action actions to v3 for security scanning
version_rules.recommendation: CodeQL v3 includes improved language detection, faster scanning, and enhanced security rule sets.

version_rules._comment: Update github/codeql-action/analyze to match init version
version_rules.recommendation: CodeQL analyze v3 must match the init action version for compatibility.
